refnamediv.refpurpose: Install local files into your Hi-Note database on your Palm handheld.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: install-hinote allows the user to write one or more files as a new Hi-Note or into the Hi-Notes Palm application itself, on the Palm handheld.
Please see http://www.cyclos.com/ for more information on Hi-Note.

blockquote.para: Write files to <category> in the Hi-Note application itself.

Use device file <port> to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, install-hinote will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable. If neither are found or supplied, install-hinote will print the usage information.
Display version of install-hinote and exit without connecting.
Display the help synopsis for install-hinote and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: The program will connect to a target Palm handheld, and write the file or files given on the commandline into the Hi-Note application.
